column1: # Events that are in vanilla id range
# but are expanded (new events in vanilla reserved range)
# or new options for existing events

column2: The more the better! Welcome this little bastard in the tribe.
For a long time we Gospodars ruled here and we shed our blood with other people of these lands. The time has come to unite with them and create new great Kislev!
Let there be one nation, one people!
Gospodars, Ungols and other people of Kislev once divided are now creating family bonds and adopting new identity.
More and more people in Kislev are adopting new identity. Some of courtiers also embraced new ways.
Whole realm has adopted new Kislevarin. My servants inform me that it is increasingly popular to show new customs and speak new Kislevarin amongst Ungol and Gospodar Boyars and Szlachta...
My wise liege has persuaded me to adopt new customs and new identity - I am not Gospodar or Ungol now I've become Kislevite!

column1: # Changes to the localisation of vanilla events to add Warhammer flavor

column2: Tales of your misdeeds are told from Albion to Cathay.
Your low character is the subject of Tilean plays.
